name: C1L1
description:
C1L1

C1L1 is the remake of the first section in Castlevania 1986 with some personal touches.

Game made in one week using Unity Engine. Some of the core mechanics (items, whip upgrades etc.) from original game are still missing.

What this remake has changed?
  • Now hearts actually giving health points to the player. Because player can not use them as ammo for throwable items.
  • Reworked the AI for Bat, Merman and the first level boss.
  • Enhanced the UI by adding damage numbers and enemy health bars.
Controls
  • Use A, D, left arrow and right arrow keys to move around.
  • Use W, S, up arrow and down arrow keys to climb stairs.
  • Use Space to jump.

I do not own any of the assets, all rights belongs to Konami.

Hope you'll enjoy.
